name: Mindcoder
body:
### Welcome to Mind Coder.
This is the project page for my Final Year Project as part of my BSc(Hons) in Applied Computing at Waterford Institute of Technology. 

###About Mind Coder 
Mind Coder is an Android application for programming Lego Mindstorms. You can write some code on an Android device, interpret and evaluate this code using ANTLR and send an output to a Mindstorm v2.0 to run. 

###Project Blog
Follow the development of this project at [MindCoderApp](http://mindcoderapp.wordpress.com/)

The functions are as follows
```
moveForward(int distance)
moveBackward(int distance)
turnLeft(int degrees)
turnRight(int degrees)
shoot(int numberOfShots)
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Authors and Contributors
The language is modeled on a set of ANTLR tutorials from [here](http://bkiers.blogspot.ie/))
All other code has been written by @Cen92

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
